name: Over the Moon (Dreamtale Games)
description:
We know about how a cow once jumped over the moon. Will you try to find out too?

Hey, diddle, diddle!

The cat and the fiddle,

The cow jumped over the moon;

The little dog laughed

To see such sport,

And the dish ran away with the spoon.

----

Еxpression “Over the moon” means a state of extreme delight, admiration for something.

This childhood legend appeared in 1765 in London and was mentioned in many works, including the book about Mary Poppins.

How to play? 

The main thing here is a stable surface and a mouse / touchpad.

  1. Grab the animal by holding left mouse button;
  2. Spin the animal with mouse movements;
  3. Release the left button and enjoy the process!

P.S.: A hint of what to do is hidden in the name of the game.

Team
